mapper.update: update user set level = #{level} where id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select u.* from user u, activity_in ai where u.id = ai.user_id and ai.activity_id = #{activityId} order by ai.create_time desc limit 0,20
mapper.sql: id, phone, nickname, password, icon_path, sex, birthday, school_id, school_name, collage_id, collage_name, major_id, major_name, education, education_date, address, province, city, street, postcode, level, accesstoken, openid, vip_expire_time, cid, user_dsp_name, email, status, invite_code, my_invite_code, registermode, district, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, phone, nickname, password, icon_path, sex, birthday, school_id, school_name, collage_id, collage_name, major_id, major_name, education, education_date, address, province, city, street, postcode, level, accesstoken, openid, vip_expire_time, cid, user_dsp_name, email, status, invite_code, my_invite_code, registermode, district, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accesstoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDspName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myInviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registermode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
